Reviews.Title: An excellent budget small HDTV
Reviews.Author: Jim Schmidt "Jimmbbo"
Reviews.Content: This is my first Vizio, after watching them for a couple of years.  I bought it to replace an early 13 inch early AQUOS LCD. Over the last five years, I own/have owned Sony, Sylvania, two AQUOS and a Samsung LCDs from 13 to 36 inch.IMO, this is a great little TV.  It is very attractive, has an excellent picture, and is easy to set up. (Other than recording the model and serial numbers, I have yet to open the manual (real men don't need no stinking instructions! ;) ), and have been able to do all I want so far using the menu system...)I am sensitive to good sound quality, and was concerned about some of the reviews complaining about the sound.  Am unsure what the folks who panned the speakers expect from a 19 inch TV, and "out of the box" the sound is a bit thin and tinny, but getting into the setup menu and playing around with the sound settings, from automatic to "roll your own" in the equalizer mode provides completely acceptable sound quality (for me) with adequate volume for a small room (this tiny TV has tiny speakers.  It is NOT a Klipsch or Bose 7.1 THX speaker set).The only thing I am not wild about is the glossy "cabinet"... I prefer a matte/semi gloss finish, but realize I'm swimming upstream on that one, so with all the pluses for this unit, I can live with the shiny case.I am pleased with this set, and if its longevity lives up to its initial perception, Vizio has a winner in the mini TV market.  If you are looking for a small HD TV, the M190VA is an excellent choice for value, features and quality.

Reviews.Title: I Love It!
Reviews.Author: Dufus
Reviews.Content: I own the 26" version of this TV (I also own a 47" Vizio) and I needed a small TV to use for a convention display table.  The reason I purchased this one is that it is unique in that it has forward facing speakers.  Most small TV's have downward facing speakers and in a large room they are much harder to hear.  This TV is perfect, small, loud volume and has a great picture.  I also like how Vizio packs their small TV's because they are easy to re-pack and the box can be used many times.  The base plate also comes off easy.Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Perfect desktop TV
Reviews.Author: Alan Morris
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a TV to use in a standard bedroom, this will surely fill the bill.  Great space saving design - thin and compact.  It is a great looking unit too.  Nice feeling and functional remote.  The picture is outstanding, especially when connected to an HD source.  Sound is really nice. This is the best TV for under $200 you can find.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for close up viewing
Reviews.Author: Kevin Broughton
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for our kids room and since they are only about 4-5 feet from the TV, its a terrific size for them.  It's as sleek and nice looking in person and the picture is outstanding.  Hooked up to a DVD player and a Roku streaming box for Netflix and both look great.  Sounds good, but then again the viewing distance is pretty close.  Not sure what it would sound like in a living room.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the price.
Reviews.Author: DonnieK
Reviews.Content: Saw this item on sale, so I purchased it to go into my two sons room.  Overall, great packaging, great shipment, super fast!However, only flaw I can tell is that my kids have bunk beds, and the tv has to be tilted a good bit for the bottom bunk to see it.  Does not have a good viewing angle, anything over 25% is grainy and shadowed. If it is for one person or a family room, where everyone sits in the same spot, at the same level, then this would make a great tv.  Super sharp, excellent brightness. Nice remote, and Plenty of connections. 3 hdmi ports!The only reason I gave it a 4 star instead of a 5 is b/c of the viewing issue.

Reviews.Title: Great set for Xbox 360
Reviews.Author: Gear Head
Reviews.Content: Been looking at some 19" HDTV's to hook up to a game console so I wouldn't tie up the main set in the living room. Seen this set at WalMart for $199.99, it really caught my eye, it's smaller than your average 19" set and has a really great picture for the price.Did some research and found that WalMart had the best deal going, OK, I was going to buy it from here but what the hey I saved some money but decided to review it here.PROS:Lots of inputs to hook up multiple gaming consolesGreat picture qualityNo screen blurring when the games get fast and furiousRelatively smallEasy set upNo dead pixels!CONS:To tell you the truth not to many, only con that I can think of its a fingerprint magnet but that's minor.I don't intend to hook it up for cable/SAT or anything but for my Xbox 360 it's a great match.I would recommend this  to anyone looking for a very good small HDTV that doesn't take up much space and has a great picture.And again I got this just for gaming and for the price it can't be beat, other HDTV's are much more expensive for the features you get in this set.I'm extremely happy with this purchase for what I'm using it for so anyone looking to buy a nice small secondary HDTV to game on this is it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV with Excellent Sound
Reviews.Author: D. Thiel "Wood, Photos, Cycling, Backpacking"
Reviews.Content: Nice price, excellent size for a kitchen, with nice forward facing speakers = easy to hear.  Recommended!

Reviews.Title: A graet bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: herman barlow jr.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this vizio 19 ince for my pc and for an aux. hdtv.This tv has fine styling and very good picture quality.The colors could be deeper for the pc.As far as the speakers  for those who complain>hook up some Boose Companion 2 to the side panal mini output($58.00 Sams whrhse ) and you will be very please.For great color ajustment and enhancement try these settings:Custom settings>>> bright-42>contas27 >color 29>tint2.Sharpness 8 >ad lum off color enhans.on>> dcr off.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: G. Robert
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this TV. It took the place of an old-style 12" and takes up only slightly more space horizontally and less in every other way. It is the perfect TV for the kitchen. Picture quality and sound are excellent for the application. One added bonus is the "Photo Input". Just put your photos on a flash drive and plug it in the USB port. Poof! Instant slide show with crisp 9x12 pictures. Fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for kitchen counter
Reviews.Author: Bruno
Reviews.Content: Great price, perfect size for our kitchen counter, easy setup and found all analog and digital channels from our cable provider. Picture is good, the sound takes some time to get use to coming from a small TV but no way am I trying to compare it to our living room surround sound setup.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound can be corrected (sorta)
Reviews.Author: Ty
Reviews.Content: If youve read most all the user reviews on this tv, like I have, you might have been skeptical of its sound quality.  And you would be right, the sound quality of this tv is worst than my little 9" audiovox lcd tv!However, if you ENABLE "srs trusurround hd" and DISABLE "srs truvolume" in the audio menu it VASTLY improves the quality of the sound.  This adjustment comes at a price, the overall volume OUTPUT is cut in half, the tv doesnt get nearly as loud and you end up going from 25-30 on the volume slider to 80-100 (100 is max) and thats just for moderate volume output.  If you plan on being in a large or noisy room this tv wont have enough power to fill the room with  decent sound.  Using any other combination of eqing within the tv menus results in terrible quality sound but much more volume power.Picture quality and the overall ergonomic design of this tv are awesome, nothing really compares in this size. The same priced hitachi 19" sold here on amazon has the same specs and better sound abilities (quality and volume) but it suffers from the same basic design of a stand that adds height to the tv, the vizio is slick and very low profile, there is NO stand to make the tv taller and the overall clean look of the vizio beats the hitachi.  I highly recommend this vizio unless your viewing room is noisy.

Reviews.Title: Should have trusted the reviews
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Ladner
Reviews.Content: The picture is beautiful and it fits perfectly in our kitchen. The sound is very unacceptable. I read the reviews about the TV having poor sound but I thought... how bad can it be? I couldn't stand it. The sound is tinny and scratchy. After two weeks I went out and bought a computer speaker system to hook up to the TV.

Reviews.Title: TV is perfect if you need one that is low profile even on its stand.
Reviews.Author: MSMargaret "Non-fiction Nut"
Reviews.Content: Based on my research, this is the only flat screen TV that does not add height when on its stand.  We thought we were going to have to make a new spot in our kitchen cabinetry when our old-style TV died.  Then we found this one, which measured exactly what we needed for our old spot.  I was so relieved that I was willing to settle for less quality, just for the fit.  But the quality is VERY GOOD, especially for the price.  Like another reviewer mentioned, I like that the speaker is on the front of the TV.  It does sound a bit tinny but it is in my kitchen so that is OK.  We think the picture quality is completely satisfactory.  It was a breeze to set up with its channel scanning wizard. Ours is black, which looks sleek and fits in well with our black appliances.

Reviews.Title: Great for my needs!  Poor sound quality
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I was a bit scared ordering a TV through the mail, but the packaging was well done, and it got here without a scratch.  The picture quality is really great for the price and the TV itself very lightweight (great for moving it in and out of a college dorm.)  The only real problem I have with it is the sound quality, which just does not compare to the picture quality.  Thankfully I had some BOSE laptop speakers lying about, which really improved the situation.  Vizio made my life that much easier by putting a headphone jack on the back.

Reviews.Title: Great Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: Marilyn 7100
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for kitchen or bedroom.  Sharp picture, good colors.  The sound is a little tinny but works fine for what I wanted in my kitchen...a white TV on the counter.  I had a problem with the delivery and it took about a month to receive it.  However, the company apologized and it was finally delivered.  VIZIO M190VA-W 19-Inch LED LCD HDTV with Razor LED Backlighting, White

Reviews.Title: Nice little TV
Reviews.Author: Kessa Lynn
Reviews.Content: I just received my Vizio 19" TV yesterday. SUPER fast shipping and im in Canada! Its a fairly run of the mill tv. The picture isnt anything special, but it works, its sleek and looks nice and most importantly, works. I bought it mostly for gaming, but Its also a nice tv for actually watching tv as well. Nice and slim. Id recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Inadequate Speakers
Reviews.Author: Paul N. Sillin
Reviews.Content: The television had a great, clear picture, good reception; we had no problem with the television itself.  However, the speakers were completely inadequate, tinny and hollow sounding.  We thought at first we could put up with it, but the longer we listened, the more irritating it became.  We returned this product and purchased a better quality one.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Paul Andry
Reviews.Content: Great little TV.  I had previously purchased a Poloroid Flat Screen from Walmart - it went blank after several months with no recourse from Walmart or Poloroid.  Granted, I did not buy the extended warranty.  After some internet research, I discovered many other dissatisfied Poloroid customers had the same experience.As I had already purchased a larger Vizio for my livingroom (and been very satisfied), I figured this would be a safe bet.  It's easy to see from across the room, any angle - great picture and, has a larger screen, yet fits perfectly under the kitchen cabinets.  We have the Vizio hooked up to the same DVR in the livingroom, so can watch / hear the same programs in both rooms - a real asset for those doing kitchen duty and/or eating at the kitchen counter.  You can't go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: If Sound Quality is Important to you
Reviews.Author: PeterB54
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for bedroom in vacation home. I'd hemmed and hawed about purchasing this particular set given the comments made about the sound quality. But considering it was going into a vacation home, the price of a refurbished unit was very reasonable, and one reviewer had written they were able to improve the quality of the sound by making adjustments to the treble and bass I decided to take the plunge. I can confirm the sound quality is less than optimal and as many have described "tinny"..... and I've not had any luck with making adjustments. In fact it is my belief that the design/quality of the speakers is so poor that I am finding it hard to detect any appreciable change in sound quality even when pushing the bass and treble settings to the extremes.  So it's a OK set, the set up was straight forward, picture quality is good, but if sound quality is important this is not the set for you regardless of price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for My Needs
Reviews.Author: Imrihil
Reviews.Content: I bought the Vizio Razor for one reason:  Unlike most flat TVs that sit on a central stand, the front of this TV contacts the counter surface.  This helps me to hide the extra cable and converter box that Comcast requires--even for a digital set.  I almost bought a similar Vizio model at Wal-mart for $199, but it was only 720p, wasn't LED backlit, and came in black only.  When I saw the white model with 1080p resolution and LED backlighting for a mere $189 on Amazon, I couldn't resist.  The TV is perfect for the kitchen counter and produces an excellent picture with an easy-to-change aspect ratio.  It also offers many different input methods, including USB for showing photos from a flash drive.  The sound, however, is unimpressive, and has a basement echo characteristic to it.  At first, I found this annoying, but I've grown accustomed to it.  In spite of the "unusual" sound characteristics, I would still recommend this TV a utilitarian for a kitchen or garage in which TV will be background entertainment.  For focused TV viewing, improved sound would be appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Good small TV
Reviews.Author: R. Zenorini
Reviews.Content: This TV is used for free over the air reception with a roof top antenna.What I like:1. Picture quality is excellent.  On HD you can see every hair on a persons head.2. Sound is satisfactory for a small tv which will be used in a small room such as a bedroom or kitchen.3. Comes in white which is good for my kitchen.4. A button on the remote will give you a description of the current program and information on the next scheduled program. A real convenience which helps with planning what you will watch next.What I don't like:1.  Viewing angle is fine left to right (horizontally) however vertically (up and down) it is terrible.  A slight change of angle and the picture darkens.  If you are standing and looking directly at the screen the picture is excellent, but sit down and the picture darkens considerably---very annoying.  The stand is not adjustable.  Look slightly up or down at the screen and it darkens it to the point that something must be done.  A real short coming that does not exist on my other larger screen LCD TV's. I  have adjusted it to a compromise position by placing a pencil under the base in order to lean the screen slightly.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular piece of equipment!
Reviews.Author: WHoustonFan26
Reviews.Content: This TV is fantastic! Its so lightweight and has a crystal clear picture. Its very stylish looking, sleek and thin. For this good of a product, you'd be a fool to pass up this item - especially with the amazing price. I HIGHLY recommend this item to any person looking for a good TV. Its also ideal for a kid since its a decent sized screen but its not overpowering. Put it this way, its so compact that it could fit on my night stand perfectly. So if you have a child, or children, this is also an ideal product for them without spending a ton of money. 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: The best one I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Hong
Reviews.Content: I hardly heard the brand name, Vizio. This is the first time that I bought this brand. This product is better than I expected!The LCD is looking good, and I can hear sound pretty clearly. The reason why I bought this item is to have another moniter for my laptop to use one as a working laptop and the other one as watching videos. So far, it exceeds my expectation.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: D. Greenebaum
Reviews.Content: Bought the Vizio TV because of reviews posted on Amazon.  The picture is great and so is the sound.  It fit the space I had for a TV.  The refresh time is much faster that the Aquos that I have in another room.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 19"
Reviews.Author: Lawrence E Schertel
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for Christmas for the kitchen. The only negative is the base keeps the TV at counter level, so I mounted it on the tile under the cabinets. Nice unit if you are looking for a good looking mall TV.

Reviews.Title: A very nice TV
Reviews.Author: B. Frymier
Reviews.Content: If I were to pick another TV, it would be Vizio.  This is a really sharp, clear image.  The only negative I would have is that hooking it up to other than cable or satalite is not easy.  I am not one who reads directions, but even reading them, it was confusing.  But once done - I loved it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Mom's Bedroom
Reviews.Author: David A. Lipper
Reviews.Content: Just got this TV for Mom's bedroom. She loves it! I noticed it had features found only on higher priced units. It picked up all her cable channels including digital and we found out she has a lot more channels than she thought. The HD is super! The picture quality is superior to some of the other models we compared side by side. I heartily recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Mere
Reviews.Content: We actually have the older model of this same tv, but we like the newer one even better. We have it on a swivel in our guest bedroom. It was very easy to install to the swivel & to set up in general. Has great picture & does not require a cable converter box. Great tv & even better price.

Reviews.Title: Picture okay, audio and captioning problems
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Dee
Reviews.Content: Would not buy again. If you want a kitchen TV, or a TV in your garage workroom, maybe, if it's on sale. The audio is really wanting, and the captioning options are not in proportion to the screen size. More trouble than it's worth.

Reviews.Title: good picture, not good sound
Reviews.Author: Vertigo
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for our kitchen and it's the perfect size to stay entertained while cooking.  The picture quality is very good and clear, but the sound quality is not good.  It sounds a little tinny.  Still, overall it's just what we needed.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO GREAT Little TV
Reviews.Author: R. VanWert "rvnwrt"
Reviews.Content: For the size it acts more like a BIG TV sound is good and the picture so clear and crisp!  It shipped SUPER FAST!!  and I chose a "used" it came still with the plastic that had to be peeled off so really it was "new".  I love it perfect for a bedroom or a RV.

Reviews.Title: vizio 19 in tv
Reviews.Author: deb
Reviews.Content: Shipped out quickly, has a great picture. We are using it in the kitchen on the counter top. Doesn't take up a lot of space. Great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for College Dorm
Reviews.Author: M. C. TAYLOR "Marie C. Taylor"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for my daughter to use in college. Dorm rooms are very small and this TV is a perfect fit. The TV is easy to set up and it can be used as a computer monitor. The quality is awesome. Perfect picture and great sound, too. There is a headphone jack so she doesn't disturb her roommate, too. Priced @ $124.00 including Shipping, Handling & tax. The perfect TV for it's purpose & price.March, 2012: I should have bought two of these...one for each of my daughters in college. The price is now $299....Ouch!!!

Reviews.Title: wonderful set but
Reviews.Author: dcbtree
Reviews.Content: Really like everything about the set.  White for kitchen plus usb to use as picture frame.  The HDMI board went out after about 3 weeks but vizio customer service was amazing.  Sent new set so I could use that box to send old one back in paid freight both ways.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Maureen Koplow
Reviews.Content: I originally bought my 92 year old mother the 19" Vizio for her bedroom for Mother's Day. Then I bought the 16" for her kitchen for her birthday, but the smaller set was not nearly as well made. The stand was flimsy, the remote control was extremely difficult to open to put in the batteries, and the picture wasn't as good as the 19". So I returned the 16" set and bought another 19" for the kitchen. She's thrilled with the 19". The picture and sound are excellent, and the TV is really well made. Simple to set up - basically just attach the cable wire, plug it in and in about 2 minutes all the channels are programmed in. My mom has 2 great TV's and we're both happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: perfect for my spare room
Reviews.Author: Ms71
Reviews.Content: I mainly bought this for the white color option. It was easy to set up and is perfect for a small room.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV for the Money!
Reviews.Author: Michael Kulik "Miata Mike"
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the money.  Using it in our kitchen.  Fantastic!  Used the photo feature and it worked well.  Very pleased with the refurb unit purchased from Amazon for $121.  Can't beat it.  The preset surround sound is a little tinny as stated in other reviews.  I turned off the surround sound and went to the equalizer setting,  set it to the "Rock" setting and the tinny sound goes away.  The sound is very good for a small set.  Awesome picture quality.  Very lightweight and fits on top of cable box under the kitchen cabinet with room to spare.  My old 19" Philips LCD (which was having powering on/off issues) took ALL the space under the cabinet and I had to lay the cable box on it's side.  I replaced that beast with this VIZIO. Nice product.  My first VIZIO, but not my last.That Philips has been moved into the guest room and will need some repair work soon, less then 2 yrs. old.  Not happy about that.  I hope the Vizio lasts a lot longer.

Reviews.Title: Great Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: W. Bentrim
Reviews.Content: VIZIO M190VA-W 19-Inch LED LCD HDTV with Razor LED Backlighting, WhiteKitchen counter space is always at a premium at our house.  I tracked down this 19" LED LCD TV and mounting bracket at Amazon.  The first thing I liked was I could get it in white.  Look around, that is not as easy as it may sound.  Secondly I have seen many Vizio TVs at friends homes and they have been happy with them.The TV gives a clear, sharp picture with good sound quality.  It is a great size for the kitchen.  I was totally impressed with all of the stations I got without the cable box.  Who knew that my channel 6 Philadelphia station had 5 variations?I have only one complaint and albeit is minor it was still annoying.  The mounting holes for the industry standard VESA mounting kit were slightly skewed.  My best guess is no more than a 1/16th or 2/16"  but the TV is slightly off kilter.  Before you assume I am the village idiot, I did us a level to mount the bracket on the wall and if I put the level on the bracket with or without the TV attached, the bracket is level.  I can only conclude that the mounting holes on the TV were slightly off.  That is the only reason I didn't give it a 5 star rating.The side lighting LEDs do seem to provide a nice bright picture and I look forward to the benefit of the long lifespan of LEDs.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 19" class tv
Reviews.Author: forsey123
Reviews.Content: purchased tv for personal gym treadmill...wall mounting was easy and remote funtions are simple...picture quality is excellent and the ledtechnology is impressive...will purchase vizio product in the future..i highly recommend this product....

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Carl G. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I put it on a mechanical arm and the 82 year old with bad eyes is loving every minute of use!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the kitchen
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a first rate tv for the kitchen, look no further.  It fits under the cabinets and blends in with white cabinets very well.  Easy to set up and a great picture. The sound is not what you would get with a larger tv, but who cares?

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: TVAZ
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv on sale and it has proven to be a quality product. The sound is a bit week but the picture is crystal clear. Definitely recommended.

Reviews.Title: great picture, average sound
Reviews.Author: Tom G
Reviews.Content: We found some computer speakers at the landfill thrift store and plugged them into the headphone jack, it sounds good now.I would have liked to sign up for an extended warranty but I don't see that available.

Reviews.Title: Excellent small TV
Reviews.Author: AppleSaucer "Paul"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a second TV for the bedroom.  I was pleasantly surprised by the picture quality, which easily matches my big set.The Vizio is very easy to set up and get started on.  The menus offer a great deal of control, but I do have one small quibble with the way they are structured.  Menus for audio and video offer a list of pre-sets, but manual control is only possible by choosing the "Custom" menu item.  Took me a minute to figure that out.  Vizio should consider renaming it "Manual" in future models.All in all, a fine set and a definite bargain!

Reviews.Title: Limited viewing angle
Reviews.Author: Tom Fleming
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for our RV. The Vizio has a very limited viewing angle in reference to top-to-bottom (vs. side to side). Prior to this Vizio, we had a cheaper LCD TV (it was dropped will loading our stuff in the trailer). The viewing angle on the cheaper unit was better.

Reviews.Title: tv review
Reviews.Author: Barbra L. Moran "barbra53"
Reviews.Content: This is a great, light-weight tv which was very reasonably priced and extremely easy to hook-up to both the cable and dvd/vcr player.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying the TV
Reviews.Author: Diane M. O' Donnell "kids mom"
Reviews.Content: TV fits well in a small area in basement bar. Good looking TV with great Picture. Company that sold TV was great to deal with.

Reviews.Title: All Good!
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: Shipped fast, was packaged well, and works fine.There is a noise when I tilt the TV around in my hands as if there is a small plastic part rattling around inside, but I mounted on the wall anyway and plugged it in and it works fine.  Must be something non-essential like a part of the cage or something.  Some quality control that could be caught before shipping but it works fine so I'm keeping it!Typical refurbished condition, as in it works as intended and has minor scratches on the back-side which doesn't matter anyway.OVERALL GREAT DEAL.  THIS IS MY SECOND REFURB VIZIO 19" LED purchased from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV at a Good prioce
Reviews.Author: BJ "Bj Lowe"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my grandson and he has been very pleased with it.Despite the fact that he carries it around like a laptop it continues to work flawlessly with satellite, games, and DVDs.If he's happy, I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: This was a good price.
Reviews.Author: Do-It-Yourself
Reviews.Content: For the price this was a good deal but I am rather dissatified with the sound quality and the fact that it adjusts the brightness on it's own which sometimes results in poor viewing.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: We've had this TV over a year and it's doing great. It's in the kittchen above the sink, so it has taken the occasional splash. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because the sound isn't all that great...but that shouldn't be a surprise.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 19" Class (M190VA)
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV. I've had it for one month. I bought it to play while I'm working on the computer. The color and sound are outstanding. I don't want a large TV, so I don't need surround sound and all the other hoopla. The colors are very rich and because the speakers are on the front, it has clear sound. I use it without cable or satellite, it's just digital signal. The channels that are sent HD are very clear. Lightweight and thin, I can put it anywhere. My seller was incredibly fast. I was supposed to wait at least a week and got it in 3 days. Definitely a good purchase and it was less expensive online than in the stores.

Reviews.Title: Great video. Poor sound.
Reviews.Author: G. Brewer "Gene38"
Reviews.Content: I've had this model for a year with no technical problems except for poor sound. The HD video is very good and it will receive cable digital channels as well as analog. The USB port works great to view photos from a flash drive. It can also be used to power a set of USB computer speakers which is what I did to correct the sound problem. The sound is fine with good speakers.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Sound
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: The TV is average at best. The sound it terrible, echos and doesn't work well. I actually needed to purchase speakers to make it better. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!

Reviews.Title: Vizio doesn't have good sound!
Reviews.Author: L. Toates
Reviews.Content: Had read other reviews about the Vizio not having good sound but couldn't believe it could be that bad.  Wrong!  It is bad!  Would not recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Small  LED LCD HDTV,from Vizio
Reviews.Author: Ronald Brezenski "poeronald"
Reviews.Content: I own two Vizio TV and both work like a charm never let me down.One is 32'and it is over three years old and bless it,still works great.New Vizio 19'is doing fine.Good picture and great sound.I also use it as a computer monitor,with Gateway computer and this works great,also watch some tv on it to.I would say,for my money,I got a more than good buy.Vizio 19'LED LCD HDTV is great.I have my cable channel come in HD 1080 and what great piture in HD.Just a great little 19'TV.

Reviews.Title: Good travel TV
Reviews.Author: D. Maurer
Reviews.Content: I bought this television to take with me when I deploy.  It works well enough and the picture is great when used with an HDMI input (laptop, PS3, etc) but it does have a few shortcomings.  The audio is inconsistent; there is not a lot of low-volume fine tuning, which is important in a dorm/billeting environment, and occasionally soundtracks will play much louder than audio for devices and media that doesn't have issues when viewed on other equipment.  Additionally, the television will need to be placed at eye level or lower; when looking up towards the TV the picture fades/washes out.  I have to place a prop (or cable) underneath the back of the stand to tip the screen forward.  Lastly I have one bad pixel on the screen, but instead of not working it just always shows red.  Not a huge deal when watching fast-moving television like football but slower programs or HD inputs make it more noticeable.I also wish it was NTSC/PAL compatible but I imagine this will be a problem most people won't have to contend with.Overall I'd recommend it but it is not a perfect TV.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO M190VA-W 19-Inch LED LCD HDTV with Razor LED Backlighting, White
Reviews.Author: Robert Katz
Reviews.Content: I am satisfied with my new VIZIO M190VA-W 19-Inch LED LCD HDTV with Razor LED Backlighting, White for my kitchen. I had to adjust the color of the TV picture to be right color and clear.

Reviews.Title: Excellent small TV  -  Vizio M190VA
Reviews.Author: creamyfudge
Reviews.Content: Quite contemporary. Wonderful picture and sound. Great for kitchen.  So happy it comes in white.  Great purchase, as well as, quick shipping.

Reviews.Title: Good Picture but poor sound
Reviews.Author: Orrin Edwards
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on-sale at a local merchant to replace an old 9 inch Zenith that I had in my home office. The picture is great, but the sound was very bad, even for small speakers. The equalizer adjustment only marginally improved the quality.  My solution was to connect a pair of PC speakers to the heahpone jack, which greatly improved the sound. I used an Altec Lansing BX1220 which has the added advantage of being powered from the TV's USB port.

Reviews.Title: Good Purchase
Reviews.Author: Wilbur P. Ahn Jr.
Reviews.Content: Was a good purchase. Perfect for our kitchen. Great picture and good sound.Easy set up and easy too operate. Get a good picture using rabbit ear antenna.

Reviews.Title: Nice set but watch who you buy it from
Reviews.Author: Greysquirrel "Greysquirrel"
Reviews.Content: The first one I bought was from Amazon Warehouse, I thought all amazon was the same, but no. Even though it was advertised as new and I paid the pice of new what I got was a repackage set, the original was torn to pieces. I was sure it was a return and that was not hard to figure out. First of all the remote had batteries installed, when I turned it on it had already been set up so I contacted Amazon and in their usual good CS the took it back but tried to charge me shipping, when I contacted them and said it was their mistake the refunded my shipping charge, a happy camper I am.I then made sure I ordered from Amazon and got a new in box TV.We have this in our camper trailer and it works great, the picture is clear even on antenna and DVD are as clear as one would want. Now the sound is not that great but sound on most small TV's is not that great as there is not much room for them to put in great speakers, but for our use in a small trailer it is OK if you go into the menu and tweak the sound. All in all for our use and for the time we use it we find it serves our purpose and would recommend it to anyone who wants a good looking white TV in their trailer. If you want it for your home you may want to run the sound through an amplifier and a set of speakers.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: H.R. Gutman
Reviews.Content: Recently bought a 19" Insignia from Best Buy for the kitchen, picture was not sharp, colors wre not bright, but it was priced right at about $155.  After a few weeks, I decided to return it.  Have a VIZIO 32" that I bought last year, and was very happy with it, so I bought the 19" Vizio  from Amazon, it was $38 more than the Best Buy Insignia, but a huge difference in quality.  Got the one with the white trim, and it looks just great.  Glad I made the change.

Reviews.Title: Kitchen
Reviews.Author: lulubm
Reviews.Content: We, already, own a 32" Vizio, which is in the living room.  We purchased it a year ago and are very satisfied with the picture quality and the sound quality.  We are disappointed with the 19" Vizio with picture quality and the sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, but..
Reviews.Author: MichaelR
Reviews.Content: It's a great little television, but that's the problem: it's awfully small. It's great for a cramped space or if you can't afford one larger, but if it's for your bedroom, I would suggest either upgrading to a 22 or 26 inch. I bought this and a week later sent it back and got a 22 inch of the same model and I'm loving it. The sound is a little poor, don't get me wrong, everything sounds fine, but even on the max you can barely hear some things. I have mine plugged into a set of computer speakers via the earphone jack and that works pretty well.All in all, this is get TV, for a great price, but it leaves much to be desired.

Reviews.Title: at last..a great little tv
Reviews.Author: Regina Drake
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small (19") for my kitchen. Locally, we only have Sears, K-Mart and Radio Shack for any electronics.  I started at Sears where I purchased a small RCA...The picture was terrible...so I returned and purchased a smaller RCA..(no others in a moderate price range)and the sound was incredibly tinny..back it went.at Radio Shack they have this vizio in black, but i wanted white.  Found this and ordered from Amazon....OUT OF THE BOX I LOVED IT....Easy to set up..forward facing great little speakers (No Bose quality but I think great for this size.)  The picture quality is great...Love the size, shape,soft white color...I would definitely look at this brand in the future for a larger size. Also this is LED LCD which really enhances picture to me.

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Bonenberger
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my kitchen. I was upsizing and needed a TV that could sit on top of a satellite receiver, yet, still fit under the cabinets in a corner. The slim design and efficient manner in which the base attaches made this TV a perfect fit with room to spare! The picture quality is very good and can be viewed from some pretty severe angles. Additionally, if you customize the sound adjustments, the sound quality is surprisingly good for a TV this size. If you're cramped for space and want a quality TV, this is the one.

Reviews.Title: 19 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Coffee Nut
Reviews.Content: Light weight, slim and attractive.  Also, the white color is good for us.  You don't have the sound quality of larger sets with larger speakers, but it is fine for use on our bedroom wall.

Reviews.Title: Big small television
Reviews.Author: sharpeducator
Reviews.Content: I have been using it one and half month and is ok about image clarity in analog and digital programs. The sound is very poor.I put self powered computer speakers (30 watt) and now it sounds great. One thing that I disagree a lot is that the black plastic that surrounds the screen is like a mirror, very reflective of any back light in the room. That kills the advantage of having a non reflective screen.

Reviews.Title: The sound is fine
Reviews.Author: R. TA "Roger"
Reviews.Content: There were a couple of reviews complaining about the sound level of this TV but it's perfectly fine on mine. In fact, it's really loud if I set to just 1/4 of the way. The picture is fine too. Happy with the set.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Reed E. Gladey
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mom for her kitchen and really the picture and sound are fine.  I looked at a lot of models and think this one is great especially at this price point.

Reviews.Title: Bought for my shop
Reviews.Author: las10044
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my shop to use as a TV and computer monitor, works great for both and has amazing color

Reviews.Title: Take The Plunge
Reviews.Author: 2 Copples
Reviews.Content: Just got my 19' Vizio for the kitchen. Looks and works great. Don't be misled by the naysayers about the sound. If you're in a small area (like a kitchen) the sound is fine. You could always hook up inexpensive speakers, but I don't think they need them. you're paying under $200 for God's sake, I don't expect BOSE quality.I'd be shocked if you weren't very happy with your purchase. Great TV for a small space or as a 2nd or 3rd TV for the home.Also able to get it in black or white. Delivery was prompt. Easy enough to plug and play. Just make sure you use an HDMI cable to connect to cable box for full HD image. You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: great picture, great size
Reviews.Author: W. Evans "Mevans"
Reviews.Content: this screen doesn't sit up too high on the base, so it fits on a bookshelf, or small space - you get the most screen possible in a tight spot.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: RubaDub "Rub-a-Dub"
Reviews.Content: Bought TV as extra for work office and it works fairly well.  Have it connected to a cheap DVD and use it as a monitor for work laptop.  Image and sound are good for those two inputs; have not had it connected to regular or HDTV.  Overall, great price from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV but One HDMI Input Was Dead
Reviews.Author: ILoveTheUSA
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my sons bedroom on Christmas and so far it has performed well.  It has 2 hdmi inputs but on ours one of them was dead.  Luckily we only needed one and it works fine.  Picture quality isn't outstanding but it is very good, especially compared to a tube tv.  Sound is only okay and if possible should be output through a stereo. Overall we're happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Good Choice
Reviews.Author: Vizio Razor
Reviews.Content: Overall I like this TV.  I have limited space in this particular room and it fits perfect.  It has a good picture for a 720p and the front speakers suited my placement too.  The sound is kind-of tinny but I expected this from previous reviews; it was not my first priority in choosing this TV.  I'm very happy with my choice.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: gr8elephant
Reviews.Content: Back in the day, a 19" TV seemed pretty big; today it's about the same size of a laptop.  That said, this a great TV, good sound, works very well for a small bedroom or in the kitchen.  Very happy with my purchase.  Well packaged, delivered quickly.

Reviews.Title: Bathroom TV.
Reviews.Author: Gene B.
Reviews.Content: Great Television for small rooms. Would not change a thing. We mounted on the wall with brackets recommended by you. Turned out perfect.

Reviews.Title: Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: mbrown
Reviews.Content: Buying the Vizio TV from Amazon was one of the better purchases I have made. It was a very good price and the shipping time was excellent. I will purchase from Amazon again. The whole experience was great.

Reviews.Title: Vozio Lives Up to It's Promise
Reviews.Author: M. Bone "Gizmo"
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Vizio M190VA-W-19 inch in white. I needed white and let me tell you there aren't that many out there. Thanks to Vizio the room is now complete.As far as the unit, the picture is crystal clear. The remote is easy to use and setup was a breeze. The only fault is the sound is not all that good. I've gone from a CRT 19" to this LCD and I guess the speaker(s) in the CRT were bigger, thus better. Vizio needs to address the sound quality. I've found that with most LCD's or Plazma's since the manufacture has limited space they use fairly small speakers. In fact, I have modified my 50" and 42" to use external speakers when not using surround sound....meaning I've cut into the internal speaker wires and ran wires to good quality external speakers. Anyway, back to the Visio, it arrived very fast, setup was easy, picture is fantastic, sound is lacking somewhat.My experience is(¯`**ø,¸¸,ø¤º°`°º¤ø,¸(¯`**.¸ Very Satisfied .¸**'¯)¸,ø¤º°`°º¤ø,¸¸,¸,ø**'¯) ||-_-||

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Robert Lum "PhotoBob"
Reviews.Content: Although the picture is not quite as good as a larger set, it is still an excellent value and has a nice picture for the money.  I also like the many adjustment features available in the set.

Reviews.Title: An OK TV for the kids room
Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: Purchased for kids room. Lightweight, mounts to wall quickly with brackets (purchase separately). Picture quality is ok if you are directly in front of the TV.Not a good picture if viewing from the side.Mounted the TV on a wall, tilted slightly forward and downward. Kids lying in bed see a very good picture. If they are standing elsewhere in the room, the picture is not so good.For the money, it's a good buy. We own three other Vizio flat screens (42", 32", and 26") and haven't had any problems with any of them. This smaller set we have been using now for six months, and it's fine.

Reviews.Title: prepare to be WOW-ED!
Reviews.Author: Rudy "rainmanva"
Reviews.Content: i love this TV, purchased it about 3 weeks ago, to replace my old analog set in my bedroom.out of the box, TV sets up easily..built in digital tuner, hdmi inputs and headphone inputs along with component video inputs.i enjoy everything about this TV, small, easy to move, adequate inputs and best of all great picture!only thing that slightly disappointed me was the sound, the speakers are tiny and seem inadequate,  this was quickly fixed with a cheap pair of pc speakers. now, i have great sound~buy this tv today, you will be glad you did!update 8/17/13 ******over 2 years of good service, still going strong. picture nice and clear and good soudn, however not very loud, due to the small design of the speakers. all in all, im really happy! great tv!

Reviews.Title: perfect Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: GLC
Reviews.Content: The Vizo is perfect for the kitchen - very sleek so it doesn't take up much counter space.  We are very satisfied with the picture quality and the audio is clear and capable of sufficient volume to be heard through out the room.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, picture quality could be better
Reviews.Author: BriannaCG
Reviews.Content: It took a while for the TV to digitally scan the channels, and on a few of the shows we've watched, wording on the bottom is cut out of the picture.  The picture quality is good, I really thought it would be better though...  It is a good, solid TV though.

Reviews.Title: Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for the kitchen. We are very satisfied with it it has a very good picture and meets our nedds.

Reviews.Title: OK but no cigar
Reviews.Author: P. Sesny
Reviews.Content: The picture is fine, but the speakers are really awful.  Also when I look at several channels, there is a white dotted line at the top of the screen (called the VITS line).  Unlike my other LCD TVs, there is no way on this set to adjust the vertical position to the line. Contact with Vizio support told me this is normal. It's very annoying.  I will be returning the set.

Reviews.Title: Vizio, Over-rated Cheap-skates of the LCD TV Market
Reviews.Author: K. Benicek
Reviews.Content: To read the company promotional information and some of the customer reviews, you'd think that this LED LCD TV was the greatest flat panel ever made! But oh wait! I've owned quite a few LCD and Plasma Flat Panels since they first came out, and I've had the opportunity to see dozens more owned by friends. So I think I've had a bit more "reference base" than most owners of this model have had.I was looking for an inexpensive small LCD to use in my office as a combination extended monitor for my Notebook PC and as a TV, so a pure monitor was not an option. I needed something with HDMI, VGA an Component Inputs as well as a very good Digital Tuner for "over the air" broadcast HD TV.  We have an over saturated selection of strong signal in the LA area, but coastal Orange County (CA)is an orphan in the eyes TV Station market - they know we're here, but you only get the left-overs, no digital repeaters anywhere near in the "OC". You had better have a darn good antenna, a strong signal amplifier and a very good tuner in your TV! More than half the channels unfortunately, are in anything but English. Usted habla inglés?The Vizio 19" Class 720p 60Hz LED LCD HDTV M190VA (actually barely a measured 18.5 inches) has a decent tuner, but hanging onto marginal stations signals is not it's strong suit. You'll experience considerable picture pixelization "breakup" and lose of sound frequently with change of weather, day-night time viewing and windy days. I never see any of these problems on the several Samsung LCD's I've owned. I could never get channel 7 (KABC) in LA, thanks partially to their stupidity of selecting a Digital technology that is different than any other broadcaster in the LA market! Smart fellas! However, our 50-inch Samsung Plasma does get KABC 7 just fine. (the wife would kill me if she didn't get to watch Desperate Housewives.)Picture quality leaves a lot to be desired too. SDTV broadcasts were always extremely "Grainy" and even many 720p and 1040p HD were blurry and slightly grainy. (yes, I know this is a 720p HD TV). I was very-very disappointed in this result. Only the strongest of LA stationsColor quality is nothing like the specs elude to (or what many review claim). No matter how much adjusting I did to the limited temperature and color controls on the Vizio 19", I never got anywhere close to real human skin tones. Other colors like Greens and Blues were exaggerated too. It was really obvious with I used the Vizio as an extension monitor via HDMI connection to my high-end notebook PC. My HP Entertainment Center Notebook was color tester spot-on right from the box. Compared to the HP, the Vizio looked like a cheap dime store comic book in exaggerated and "off" colors. I would rate this Vizio as one of the worst I've ever seen with only "Westinghouse" and other "off brands" doing worse or the same.The remote control is nice and well layed out, but the TV on-screen controls are confusing and many functions are "locked out" when certain functions are selected and you get no warning of this. The manual is just plain useless as is Vizio Tech Support in helping you set up or explain control functions.Sound is weak if you are in anything but a small quiet room; however considering the size of the tiny speakers in the bottom of the Flat Panel, the fidelity is not too bad. You will get a "stereo" choice, though you can't really tell it's stereo as the speakers are too close to each other.Now for the "Cheap-skate" aspect of Vizio. I intended to mount this LCD TV / Monitor on a desk stand with a standard X mount, which Vizio does support. However, there were no mounting screws in the box with the TV! I couldn't even find any info in the patetic manual about what the screw size was (obviously metric). When I contacted Vizio Support, they said that they don't provide those screws (4) and they should come with the wall or desk mount! WHAT!!?? I said to them "how is a mount manufacturer supposed to know what screws every TV is likely to use?? (every other LCD and Plasma I have ever owned came with mounting screws). Conclusion - Vizio = Cheap skates. BTW - I finally found out on the Vizio website that the screws are M4 x 10mm with .7mm pitch. You're local Ace Hardware may or may not carry these, so good luck!Conclusion - I have no idea where all these glowing reviews are actually looking at. Maybe this it the first new LCD they've bought in 8 years or the reviewers need glasses. IMHO, the Vizio LED LCD TV M190VA is VERY over-rated in picture quality. Quality of manufacture is decent and finish is OK. I'd suggest that you consider better brands like Samsung, Sony, LG, Toshiba, etc., rather than Vizio. I'm not impressed at all.

Reviews.Title: transistor radio sound
Reviews.Author: lotusboy
Reviews.Content: Picture is fine, overall appearance great, sound is awful.....so bad I lose interest in program because of the tinny sound distraction....gonna try external speakers, but of course that takes space and additional $...never dreamt I would have to shop for a tv by sound

Reviews.Title: Wish I could get a picture
Reviews.Author: R
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a move in gift for a friend who moved to Evanston IL and when I went to visit a month later I set it up as my friend is "technology challenged".  Set up was easy, but it the TV is unable to get a signal on the antenna mode.  I checked a TV Website and found that the address if 10 miles from the TV tower (on the Willis/Sears building in Chicago).  I really expected this TV to be able to get a signal from only 10 miles away without having to add an antenna, especially when the broadcast antennas are on top of one of the worlds tallest building.  I can only assume that Vizio must have a very poor antenna in the TV.  VERY DISAPPOINTED in this TV for that aspect.  I can't review the picture, sound or anything else as all I get is "no signal".  In my opinion, if your wanting a TV for over the air signal, stay away from this one.Update - Was on my way to get an external antenna for this TV when I stopped at a garage sale and they had one for fifty cents.  I attached it to the TV and rescanned the channels, amazing that I now had over 30 channels found when without an external antenna I had zero.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Jeff Kaiser "jkaiz"
Reviews.Content: For a small TV is actually has decent picture quality.  The sound on the TV itself is horrible but that's nothing I didn't expect from Vizio, So I have a separate set of computer speakers to use for the TV.Overall, Definitely a decent quality TV, other than the sound, no complaints. 4.5 stars if I could, but not a complete 5 star.

Reviews.Title: I wish there were negative ratings for this product
Reviews.Author: Vicki Montalto
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a Christmas gift for my son. He plugged it in and got a white screen. He called Vizio for trouble shooting help and after several calls with them found out the TV was refurbished! Neither Amazon nor the company that sent me the TV have responded to my request to pay for shipping it back. Under these circumstances, I am seriously thinking about not purchasing anything from Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: Nice little TV
Reviews.Author: Vox Florida
Reviews.Content: Would you believe they do not ship this with any kind of antenna?  I've never purchased any kind of TV in my life that did not come with some sort of antenna, but Vizio decided not to include one with this TV.  I guess they think everyone on the planet has coax connecting them to cable or a dish.  News: some of us are still happy to get our signal off the air, you need to include at least a basic whip antenna.  I had to rig up something until I can get out and buy an antenna.Picture's great, depending on the source.  The speakers, of course, are a joke; I have this in my computer room, so I routed the headphone output to my line input on my computer.  A lot of fiddling with volume settings, but I get better quality that way.You cannot individually tune in a channel if it gets missed from the initial channel scan.  This is a common problem with TVs these days.  If you get a better antenna you have to rescan everything (and then take out all the home shopping, foreign language and religious programming channels all over again.)Because the base is integrated into the unit, there's no tilting up or down, which limits where you can put the TV.  I had to slice a cork in half and wedge it under the base in back to tilt it a little downward for the best picture.

Reviews.Title: Should have gone bigger
Reviews.Author: Arthur E. Richards
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our bedroom. After using it for a while, think I should have gone a little larger. It works OK, but it is a little hard to see when laying in bed, because of its small screen. I like the auto turn off feature though, so when I sometimes fall asleep, it will shut off on its own.

Reviews.Title: LA MEJOR RELACION PRECIO VALOR!
Reviews.Author: William Dugarte
Reviews.Content: Este es un bello TV que en mi opinion tiene un sitio especifico en la casa: LA COCINA. Ciertamente es muy delgado, elegante y llena las espectativas para aquella persona Que busca un TV para ubicar en la COCINA pues cumple con las condiciones para empotrar en un granito o simplemente poner sobre la pared, el dise;o le permite disfrutar de una pantalla completa mientras es discreto y pasa a ser un ADORNO mas en su decoracion. El color Blanco especial para quien quiere combinar un TOPE o los muebles. La Unica razon por la cual no le dos las 5 ESTRELLAS es por la misma que solo lo ubico en la COCINA..."EL AUDIO". El sonido no es el que espera un AUDIOFILO, ni aquel que busca disfrutar de un CONCIERTO o efectos especiales, asi que en mi opinion tiene un audio y sonido de reproduccion NORMAL, por lo cual no lo colocaria como TV de una habitacion a menos que cuente con un sonido alterno de reproduccion. EN PRECIO VALOR es increible que por este precio se optenga un TV LED que cumpla con un bello dise;o, muy delgado, elegante y de calidad. AQUI LO TIENEN y lo recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: Broke within 24 Hours
Reviews.Author: Matthew "MacGyver4ever"
Reviews.Content: The TV worked great for the f1rst 24 hours.  We hooked up my PS3 to it and it was accepting a 1080P signal, and it looked great.  We were more than impressed for the cost. While watching a football game the screen suddenly turned white, and would not product anything else.  Pushing input, unplugging it, and doing research to fix it revealed it was broken.  Returning it and trying again, but not expecting good results.  Buyer BEWARE.Edit: Replacement TV has worked well for the past 2 years.  Must have just gotten a lemon...  Increased review from 1 star to 3.

Reviews.Title: NOT a Bargain !
Reviews.Author: Roger Anthony
Reviews.Content: I was excited about this TV because I thought it was a great value.  When I set it up I was disappointed to see that the picture in HD wasn'e even as crisp as my old 13 inch analogue set!  No matter how I tried to tweak it, the picture was faded and washed out.  And the speakers were terrible too.  I returned it and bought a Samsung for about $30 more.  Well worth the extra money.  If price alone is your criteria, you may be happy.  Otherwize, select another set.

Reviews.Title: Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: J. Keough
Reviews.Content: The TV has a nice picture and the sound is pretty good for a small TV, when you can get sound. I can set the sound at a normal level, within a couple minutes it goes to extremely loud to not being able to hear it. Has nothing to do with commercials or the station.

Reviews.Title: vizio 19 inch
Reviews.Author: robert J
Reviews.Content: The 19 inch Vizio has a decent picture but only on some channels. Others are way off in regards to color/tint/contrast and it seems to very difficult and/or next to impossible to improve it on a consistent basis.However, in comparison to the sound the picture is first class. It's hard to comprehend that anyone at Vizio who truly believes in a quality product let this model out the door.We are very unhappy with the purchase overall and for the above mentioned reasons will stay far away from any other Vizio products.

Reviews.Title: Terrible sound!
Reviews.Author: MARK "Mark S."
Reviews.Content: Why anyone would rate the sound as good on this TV I can only guess...Maybe they work for Vizio or they're deaf.I had it a month and couldn't stand it anymore. I only paid $157. at Costco and returned it.I have a 15" Toshiba, a 19" Sharp, and a 19" Samsung, and while none has good sound, they are OK to live with, and all have much better sound then the Visio.The tuner is also lacking as it is the old style from 2007 vintage.

Reviews.Title: This is a great desktop TV
Reviews.Author: Stephen Kelley
Reviews.Content: Once I hooked this tv up correctly with HDMI cables it has a great picture.  Without the HDMI cable the picture is really bad.

Reviews.Title: It was broken!!!
Reviews.Author: wpaniagua
Reviews.Content: At the arrival of the TV we plug it in and it didn't work.  We couldn't turn it on and, as we flew it outside of the USA, it would cost us more to send it back to the sates than the cost of the TV.We lost our time and money.  AWFUL EXPERIENCE!!

Reviews.Title: An unopened present
Reviews.Author: Burton L. Wood
Reviews.Content: The requirement that I complete each step before making this statement negates the value of my review.  I purchased this as a Cr model.  I wouldn't have purchased it if I didn't believe it would be an excellent produc suiting  the receivers need for a small TV for her kitchen.  Ask me again later and I'll give you a review worth reading.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed with HDTV
Reviews.Author: Dawn M. Miller
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Vizio 19" HDTV for my bedroom. It sits on top of the dresser. Because of the height of the dresser, viewing the TV while laying in bed makes the picture messed up. If I stand straight ahead of the TV, the picture is great, however, there is no other place to put the TV in my room. Maybe any HD TV would do this; I'm not sure.

ProductInfo.Features:
Razor LED backlighting
Less than 2.29" thin (max depth 5.51" with stand).
SRS TruVolume and SRS TruSurround HD audio
Built-in ambient light sensing technology
Exceeds Energy StarTM 4.0 guidelines
ProductInfo.Name: Vizio 19" Class 720p 60Hz LED LCD HDTV (M190VA)
